entry.value: insert into json.weather (id, timezone, lat, lon, dt, temp, feels_like, pressure, humidity, dew_point, uvi, clouds, visibility, wind_speed, wind_deg, pop, weather_id, weather_main, weather_description, weather_icon) VALUES ('${id}', '${timezone}', ${lat}, ${lon}, ${dt}, ${temp}, ${feels_like}, ${pressure}, ${humidity}, ${dew_point}, ${uvi}, ${clouds}, ${visibility}, ${wind_speed}, ${wind_deg}, ${pop}, ${weather_id}, '${weather_main}', '${weather_description}', '${weather_icon}')
